scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is a copy of a photograph of a theater backdrop that was painted by Cy Twombly in Lexington, Virginia. The location and name of the theater production is unknown.

Copy of a Photograph of a Theater Backdrop Painted by Cy Twombly, WLU Coll. PP 0098, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA

Enclosed is an article by Rev. Barrett of the R. E. Lee Episcopal Church, entitled, " The Little Comet: A Christmas Play for Children in One Act and Four Scenes," Christmastime, 1953-c.1957. This article includes a photo of the play with the Twombly backdrop.
